original_title: Stephen Colbert's Live Election Night Democracy's Series Finale
overview: Late night host Stephen Colbert leads a live 2016 election night special of anything-goes political satire and social commentary. Featuring real-time reactions as the results come in, plus an eclectic group of guests to break it all down.
tagline: Who's going to clean up this shit?
title: Stephen Colbert's Live Election Night Democracy's Series Finale
